q: We must not be afraid of dreaming the seemingly impossible if we want the seemingly impossible to become a reality.
h:
“We must not be afraid of dreaming the seemingly impossible if we want the seemingly impossible to become a reality.” —
Vaclav Havel

q: There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires.
h:
“There is no fear for one whose mind is not filled with desires.” —
Buddha

q: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
h:
“Courage is knowing what not to fear.” —
Plato

q: You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.
h:
“You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.” —
Eric Hoffer

q: Never fear quarrels, but seek hazardous adventures.
h:
“Never fear quarrels, but seek hazardous adventures.” —
Alexandre Dumas

q: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will.
h:
“Thinking will not overcome fear but action will. ” —
W. Clement Stone

q: Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
h:
“Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.” —
Zen Proverb

q: The number one cause of failure is the fear of failure.
h:
“The number one cause of failure is the fear of failure.” —
Steve Harvey

q: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.
h:
“I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.” —
Stephen Hawking

q: FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.
h:
“FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Have a vision, trust yourself, break some rules, ignore the naysayers, don't be afraid to fail.
h:
“Have a vision, trust yourself, break some rules, ignore the naysayers, don't be afraid to fail.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

q: The secret of perfect health lies in keeping the mind always cheerful - never worried, never hurried, never borne down by any fear, thought or anxiety.
h:
“The secret of perfect health lies in keeping the mind always cheerful - never worried, never hurried, never borne down by any fear, thought or anxiety.” —
Sathya Sai Baba

q: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
h:
“The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Don't ever be afraid to put yourself in a lesser position so that you can learn something from someone who knows more.
h:
“Don't ever be afraid to put yourself in a lesser position so that you can learn something from someone who knows more.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.
h:
“Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.” —
Dan Brown

q: Confidence comes not from always being right but not fearing to be wrong.
h:
“Confidence comes not from always being right but not fearing to be wrong.” —
Unknown

q: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
h:
“I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.” —
Nelson Mandela

q: He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.
h:
“He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

q: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
h:
“Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.
h:
“They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.” —
James Allen

q: Fear does not have any special power unless you empower it by submitting to it.
h:
“Fear does not have any special power unless you empower it by submitting to it.” —
Les Brown

q: Life begins where fear ends.
h:
“Life begins where fear ends.” —
Osho

q: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
h:
“Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.” —
Stephen King

q: Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.
h:
“Fear is a natural reaction to moving closer to the truth.” —
Pema Chodron

q: Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
h:
“Fear is stupid. So are regrets.” —
Marilyn Monroe

q: Courage is fear that has said its prayers and decided to go forward anyway.
h:
“Courage is fear that has said its prayers and decided to go forward anyway.” —
Joyce Meyer

q: A clear conscience never fears midnight knocking.
h:
“A clear conscience never fears midnight knocking.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
h:
“You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

q: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
h:
“The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.” —
Mark Twain

q: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
h:
“The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.” —
Jiddu Krishnamurti

q: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
h:
“Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.” —
George Addair

q: Great minds are always feared by lesser minds.
h:
“Great minds are always feared by lesser minds.” —
Dan Brown

q: Our greatest fears lie in anticipation.
h:
“Our greatest fears lie in anticipation.” —
Honore de Balzac

q: It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
h:
“It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.” —
Albus Dumbledore

q: Failure is an option, fear is not.
h:
“Failure is an option, fear is not.” —
James Cameron

q: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
h:
“Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
h:
“Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: Hope and fear come from feeling that we lack something; they come from a sense of poverty.
h:
“Hope and fear come from feeling that we lack something; they come from a sense of poverty.” —
Pema Chodron

q: If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.
h:
“If the happiness and prosperity of other people depend on you, you have nothing to fear anymore.” —
Robert Greene

q: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
h:
“Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.” —
Brian Tracy

q: If you're afraid - don't do it, - if you're doing it - don't be afraid!
h:
“If you're afraid - don't do it, - if you're doing it - don't be afraid! ” —
Genghis Khan

q: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers.
h:
“The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers.” —
Amelia Earhart

q: Do not look upon this world with fear and loathing. Bravely face whatever the gods offer.
h:
“Do not look upon this world with fear and loathing. Bravely face whatever the gods offer.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

q: There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.
h:
“There is an essence of when you are fearless, you become more creative.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
h:
“Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Fear of death is fear of the Unknown.
h:
“Fear of death is fear of the Unknown.” —
Adi Da Samraj

q: A fear-oriented man is always calculating, planning, arranging, safeguarding. His whole life is lost in this way.
h:
“A fear-oriented man is always calculating, planning, arranging, safeguarding. His whole life is lost in this way.” —
Osho

q: Fear of death is fear of surrender to Infinity. Learn to surrender, to exist at Infinity while alive, and fear of death dissolves.
h:
“Fear of death is fear of surrender to Infinity. Learn to surrender, to exist at Infinity while alive, and fear of death dissolves.” —
Adi Da Samraj

q: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
h:
“There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: You can only be afraid of what you think you know.
h:
“You can only be afraid of what you think you know.” —
Jiddu Krishnamurti
